content:
Introduction

  • Name
  • Type: Military, covert, criminal, governmental, religious etc
  • Headquarter: The primary base of operation
  • Founders
  • Oppositions (who/what and why): rivals, competitors or enemy e.g. other similar organisation, law enforcement who disagrees because of political, religious, intellectual disagreement or just competitive spirit.

History

  • Created: how it came into existence, with dates and specifics
  • Founders
  • History: Since it was created to current time
  • Purpose: The reason it was created e.g. to fight for justice
  • Goal: Current target or aim, e.g. free all the women unjustly imprisoned

Membership

  • Leadership: Names of leaders and position
  • Important members: Names of key members and their role or importance
  • Notable members: Names of members who plays certain role in the story and are worthy of mention e.g. the security guard who jumped in took the bullet and died for the president.

Operation

  • Requirements: requitment process or pre-requisites to join
  • Promotion: How to move up the ranks
  • Finance: Source(s) of money or funding and other fiduciary issues like wages
  • Administration: the hierarchy and day to day running of the organisation

Arcs

The role they play in the story or one/more arcs they are involved in
